Chapter 3 Powerball If you enjoy playing for big cash prizes, then Powerball is the game for you! Powerball could make you the next multimillionaire Virginia Lottery Well, with that sort of tag-line Powerball sounds simply wonderful. Here we dive into the game and look into how likely you are to become the next millionaire. Multiple Winners If more than one ticket matches all six numbers in a drawing, winners will share the jackpot. Likelihood of multiple winnersbigger the prize > more players > higher chance of split Cash vs Annual Payout If you do win the jackpot, you will need to choose either an annual payout or cash option when you claim your prize. There is a DCF consideration here.
